mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.role_name as roleName , r.creator, r.create_time as createTime, r.status FROM tb_sys_group_role gr join tb_sys_role r on gr.role_id = r.id where gr.user_group_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and gr.`status` = '1' and r.`status` = '1' ORDER BY r.create_time ASC

SELECT r.role_name as roleName FROM tb_sys_group_role gr JOIN tb_sys_role r ON gr.role_id = r.id WHERE gr.user_group_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND gr.`status` = '1' AND r.`status` = '1' ORDER BY r.create_time ASC

SELECT DISTINCT t1.id as groupId, t1.group_name as groupName, t1.create_time as createTime, t1.`status` FROM tb_sys_group t1, tb_sys_group_role t2 where t1.id = t2.user_group_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.role_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t1.create_time ASC

select DISTINCT t.id as groupId, t.group_name as groupName, t.create_time as createTime, t.`status` from tb_sys_group t left join (SELECT DISTINCT t1.id, t1.group_name FROM tb_sys_group t1, tb_sys_group_role t2 where t1.id = t2.user_group_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where t.`status` = '1' and tt.id is null
and t.group_name like CONCAT('%', #{userGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC,t.id DESC

select DISTINCT t.id, t.role_name as roleName, t.create_time as createTime, t.creator, t.`status` from tb_sys_role t left join (SELECT t1.id, t1.role_name FROM `tb_sys_role` t1 , tb_sys_group_role t2 where t1.id = t2.role_id and t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t2.user_group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt on t.id = tt.id where t.`status` = '1' and tt.id is null
and t.role_name like CONCAT('%', #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC, t.id DESC
